description.brazilian: O Trishul, concedido pela Deusa da Guerra, Durga
description.english: The Trishul, granted by the Goddess of War, Durga
description.french: Le Trishula, accordé par Dourga, déesse de la guerre
description.german: Der Dreizack, den dir die Kriegsgöttin Durga geschenkt hat.
description.italian: Il Trishula, concesso da Durga, dea della guerra.
description.japanese: 争いの女神ドゥルガーからトリシューラを授かる
description.russian: Тришул — оружие, полученное в дар от богини войны Дурги.
description.schinese: 战争女神杜尔迦所赐予的三叉戟
description.spanish: El Trishul, otorgado por Durga, diosa de la guerra

description.brazilian: Ouça a história inteira do nascimento da Deusa Durga
description.english: Listen to the complete story about the birth of Goddess Durga
description.french: Écoutez entièrement l'histoire de la naissance de la déesse Dourga
description.german: Hör dir die vollständige Geschichte über die Geburt der Göttin Durga an.
description.italian: Ascolta l'intero mito sulla nascita della dea Durga.
description.japanese: 女神ドゥルガーの出自の話を最後まで聞く
description.koreana: 두르가 여신의 탄생 설화를 전부 들음
description.russian: Полностью прослушайте историю рождения богини Дурги.
description.schinese: 聆听关于杜尔迦女神诞生的整个故事
description.spanish: Escucha toda la historia del nacimiento de la diosa Durga

description.brazilian: Conclua a fase "As Ruínas"
description.english: Complete the level "The Ruins"
description.french: Terminez le niveau « Les ruines »
description.german: Schließe den Level "Die Ruine" ab.
description.italian: Completa il livello "Le rovine"
description.japanese: 「遺跡」をクリアする
description.russian: Пройдите уровень «Руины».
description.schinese: 完成关卡"废墟"
description.spanish: Completa el nivel "Las ruinas"

description.brazilian: Aprenda sobre os nove avatares da Deusa Durga
description.english: Learn about all the nine avatars of Goddess Durga
description.french: Découvrez l'histoire des neufs avatars de la déesse Dourga
description.german: Erfahre mehr über die neun Avatare der Göttin Durga.
description.italian: Scopri quali sono i nove avatar della dea Durga
description.japanese: ドゥルガーの９つの化身についての話を全て聞く
description.koreana: 두르가의 아홉 화신에 관하여 알게 됨
description.russian: Узнайте все о девяти аватарах богини Дурги.
description.schinese: 了解杜尔迦女神的九个化身
description.spanish: Aprende acerca de los nueve avatares de la diosa Durga

description.brazilian: Sharanga, um arco poderoso, concedido por Vishnu
description.english: Sharanga, a mighty bow, granted by Lord Vishnu
description.french: Sharanga, un puissant arc, offert par le seigneur Vishnou
description.german: Sharanga, ein mächtiger Angriff, den dir der große Vishnu vermacht hat.
description.italian: Sharanga, un arco poderoso, concesso dal dio Vishnu
description.japanese: ヴィシュヌ神から全能の武器シャランガを授かる
description.koreana: 강력한 활 샤랑가를 비슈누 신께 하사받음
description.russian: Шаранга, могучий лук, полученный в дар от господа Вишну.
description.schinese: 毗湿奴大神所赐予的沙兰加之弓
description.spanish: Sharanga, el poderoso arco otorgado por el gran Vishnu

description.brazilian: Aprenda sobre Shakti, a energia cósmica primordial
description.english: Learn about Shakti, the primordial cosmic energy

description.japanese: 宇宙の力の根源シャクティについて話を聞く
description.koreana: 태초의 우주적 에너지인 샤크티에 관하여 알게 됨

description.schinese: 了解大圣母，宇宙原初的能量所在
